cookies.title: TrackIt uses cookies!
cookies.text: We use cookies to personalize your experience. By continuing to use this site, you consent to our use of cookies.

landing.title: Welcome to
landing.paragraphEnd: to easily manage your expenses, plan trips, and handle currency exchanges. Get started today!

isAuthenticated.title: Hello
isAuthenticated.paragraph: It's time to take control of your finances. Start managing your expenses now to stay on top of your budget and achieve your financial goals.

features.paragraph: simplifies expense management with powerful features for budgeting, trip planning, and currency conversion. Enjoy seamless organization and insightful financial tracking in one intuitive app.
features.Feature1Description: Track your expenses on a daily, monthly, or yearly basis with customizable views.
features.Feature1Benefit: Provides a detailed overview of your spending habits over different time frames.
features.Feature2Description: Plan trips and manage all related expenses, including travel, accommodation, and activities.
features.Feature2Benefit: Keeps your trip budget on track and simplifies expense management for each journey.
features.Feature3Description: Convert expenses across different currencies using real-time exchange rates.
features.Feature3Benefit: Ideal for international travelers and users with multi-currency expenses.
features.Feature4Description: Sign up and log in securely to access your financial data and manage expenses.
features.Feature4Benefit: Protects your personal and financial information with robust security features.
features.Feature5Description: Generate detailed reports of your expenses by category, date, or trip for better financial analysis.
features.Feature5Benefit: Helps you understand your spending patterns and make informed financial decisions.
features.Feature6Description: Choose from multiple themes and switch between languages like English and German.
features.Feature6Benefit: Personalizes the app experience and enhances accessibility for a global audience.

devices.title: Track Your Expenses Anytime, Anywhere
devices.paragraph: ensures you never miss a beat, whether you're at your desk, commuting, or on vacation. Our app is designed to work flawlessly on your smartphone, tablet, and desktop, providing a seamless experience across all your devices. Manage your expenses effortlessly and stay organized wherever you are.

feedback.title: What Our Users Are Saying
feedback.paragraphEnd: has made managing finances easier for our users. They love the simplicity and effectiveness of our app across all devices. Read their stories and see the impact for yourself.
